org.epics.graphene

Class MultiAxisLineGraph2DRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.epics.graphene.Graph2DRenderer<MultiAxisLineGraph2DRendererUpdate>
      • org.epics.graphene.MultiAxisLineGraph2DRenderer

  • public class MultiAxisLineGraph2DRenderer
extends Graph2DRenderer<MultiAxisLineGraph2DRendererUpdate>
    Renderer for a line graph with multiple y axes.
    Author:
    carcassi, sjdallst

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static InterpolationScheme DEFAULT_INTERPOLATION_SCHEME
      Default interpolation scheme: nearest neighbor.

      Default interpolation scheme: nearest neighbor.

      Default separate area flag: false (all lines overlap in one area).

        public void update(MultiAxisLineGraph2DRendererUpdate update)
        Description copied from class: Graph2DRenderer
        Applies the update to the renderer.

        When sub-classing, one should re-implement this method by first calling it and then applying all the updates specific to the sub-class.

        Overrides:

      • calculateGraphArea

        protected void calculateGraphArea()
        Description copied from class: Graph2DRenderer
        Calculates the graph area based on:
        • The image size
        • The plot ranges
        • The value scales
        • The font for the labels
        • The margins
        To calculate area based on labels, ensure that calculateGraphArea() is called prior to calling calculateGraphAreaNoLabels().
        Overrides:
        calculateGraphArea in class Graph2DRenderer<MultiAxisLineGraph2DRendererUpdate>

      • calculateGraphAreaSplit

        protected void calculateGraphAreaSplit()

        Description copied from class: Graph2DRenderer

      • drawVerticalReferenceLines

        protected void drawVerticalReferenceLines()
        Description copied from class: Graph2DRenderer
        Draw reference lines that correspond to reference values. Reference lines are drawn on the exact pixel that represents a reference value.
        Overrides:
        drawVerticalReferenceLines in class Graph2DRenderer<MultiAxisLineGraph2DRendererUpdate>
